  /model to try Opus 4.5

❯ /help
──Claude Code v2.1.29 general  commands ─ custom-commands (←/→ or tab to cycle)─


  Claude understands your codebase, makes edits with your permission, and
  ! for bash modeds — ridouble tap esc to clear input   ctrl + z to suspend
  / for commands        shift + tab to auto-accept      meta + p to switch
  & for background      ctrl + t to show todosutput     ctrl + g to edit in
                        shift + ⏎ for newline           /keybindings to
                                                        customize

 For more help: https://code.claude.com/docs/en/overview
 Esc to cancel
